mapper.insert:
insert into tb_message (message_id, message_channel_id, message_from, message_to, message_create_datatime, message_content) values
(#{item.messageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.messageChannelId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.messageFrom,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.messageTo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.messageCreateDatatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.messageContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
on duplicate key update message_channel_id = values(message_channel_id), message_from = values(message_from), message_to = values(message_to), message_create_datatime = values(message_create_datatime), message_content = values(message_content)
